attributes.action: Call parliament to stop messing around, and have the balls to stop Brexit NOW!
attributes.additional_details:
The EU referendum was not a legally binding vote!

It was basically to get the publics opinion, and there is absolutely no obligation to follow through with it. As a large proportion of the public now think they made a mistake and the country is in ruins, the government should do what they are voted in for and start governing, and put a stop to this now for the good of the country. 

There is too much buck passing and shirking responsibilities, and this will drag on for far too long now.
attributes.background: This has gone too far, we're in a total mess, the economy is broken, Johnson has chickened out, Farage thinks he represents the UK, the government is a farce, the country has been lied to. Politicians need to do their job and put a stop this ASAP for the good of the country. It's now a total Joke!
